name: Youmu is a zombie!
description:
This is a game for the the Touhou gamejam 3!

It is a puzzle game! You push blocks and stuff

Also if you have a xinput/xbox controller

Z (kb) = A (x)

X (kb) = X (x)

ENTER (kb) = Start (x)

Art: https://twitter.com/CookieRobo

Music: https://twitter.com/CookieRobo

Programming: https://twitter.com/CookieRobo

Story: https://twitter.com/CookieRobo

Helped brew tea for everyone on the team: https://twitter.com/CookieRobo
